safetyTips: Not allowing customers to enter shop. Staff are gloved and masked. Complete disinfectant every 2 hrs on handles and surfaces. Screens to be put in place.
name: BARBARA-ANN CLARKS COFFEE SHOP & TEA ROOMS
address: The Courtyard, Evegate Business PK, Station Road, Smeeth near Ashford, Kent, TN25 6SX
description: Homemade sweet and savoury tarts, best Coffee, light lunches, High Teas,  Sweet & Savoury Cream tea's. Can deliver if local or collection from shop. Order by phone or email.
